title: Background Color Picker
text: Here, we can change the Background color and see that color code

title: Counter
text: In this project, we can Increase, decrease and reset the numbers.

title: Reviews
text: Here we can see the different client reviews and even see the radom one.

title: Menu
text: In this project, we can see different menu items and choose that item according to the category.

title: Weather App
text: Weather app in Vanilla Javascript, CSS, and HTML. I use the Open Weather Map API to make calls to a restful API to return the current weather data.

title: Calendar
text: A simple, lightweight, vanilla JavaScript calendar that allows you to filter dates, set events in a particular date, enable/disable past dates, and much more.

title: Quize App
text: This application will be able to load questions from a 3rd party API, track and display high scores, save high scores in Local Storage and so much more

title: Movie App
text: This is a simple movie app that uses The Movie Database API to fetch data and we can also search for movies and watch the trailer.

title: Tetris Game
text: This is a simple no nonsense version of Tetris game made up of different JavaScript functions and basic html/css
